Our Services

what we do

SG & Associates, LLC is extremely dedicated to helping you save money while maintaining a clean and safe working environment, in addition to protecting your image from being tarnished. We understand that a badly maintained property will reflect poorly on your professionalism. SG & Associates, LLC is trusted by some of the most renowned businesses in the Washington DC Metropolitan area. No matter how small or large the job, we can custom create a schedule that works around your hours and needs.

Our staff are all extensively trained not only in janitorial requirements but also in proper etiquette while on the job. Construction site, strata property, office, retail, car dealership or showroom, we meet each of our clients' unique janitorial needs in a responsive and skilled manner so that you never have to worry about your commercial janitorial service when you deal with SG & Associates, LLC.

our capabilities

  • Facilities management operations and maintenance
  • janitorial
  • shipping/receiving
  • office moving
  • systems furniture reconfiguration
  • HVAC/electrical
  • landscaping
  • mechanical services
  • construction cleaning
  • office buildings and suites
  • construction and renovation projects
  • recreational facilities
  • shopping centers
  • banks and credit unions
  • industrial complexes
  • warehouse units
  • schools
  • court houses
  • administration offices

we service

Government

As a 8(a), WOSB, MBE/EDBE/ACDBE- MDOT company, SG & Associates, LLC is able to provide responsive, quality facilities services to federal, state & local government agencies, secure facilities, embassies, medical and hospital buildings. Our team comes with HSPD-12 Clearance badge & uniformed.

Commercial

SG&A specializes in comprehensive construction management as well as general contracting. We understand deadlines and costs are crucial elements to any contracting job, and we will work with you from the beginning to ensure we're exceeding your expectations. Our diverse portfolio includes all components of light construction, post construction clean up, building construction and property management. We pride ourselves on being a OSHA certified & safety company.

Residential

Our residential services include all janitorial cleaning, windows, etc. Turn key for apartments, townhomes, condos & rentals solutions:

  • Painting, carpentry, and drywall services
  • Carpeting cleaning and installation
  • Flooring repair and installation
  • Full unit deep cleaning
  • General preventative maintenance

Who We Are

We are an 8(a), minority, woman-owned business. We provide quality service to public and private industries in addition to government contracting.
